rules.natural: If the news outlet provides positive media coverage, then there is no political interference by the government agency.
Provided that the corporation provides corporate sponsorship, then if the research paper passed peer review, there is no political interference by the government agency.
Either the corporation provides corporate sponsorship or there is academic collaboration with the university.
Whenever there is academic collaboration with the university, then if the research paper passed peer review, there is no political interference by the government agency.
Should the findings be challenged in peer review, then publication is not delayed by the scientific journal.
Either there is public skepticism in public opinion, or if the prediction model is an accurate climate model, then data is collected from the field study.

In case emergency response is activated by the government agency, then either an extreme weather event occurs as a natural phenomenon, or if the field team is deployed for the research expedition, then if the measurement device's sensors are calibrated, the climate study research is completed.
Either emergency response is activated by the government agency or disaster relief is mobilized by the relief organization.
If data is collected from the field study, then if the climate study research is not completed, funding is not approved for the research project.

Assuming disaster relief is mobilized by the relief organization, then either an extreme weather event occurs as a natural phenomenon, or if the field team is deployed for the research expedition, then if the measurement device's sensors are calibrated, the climate study research is completed.
Provided that a policy change is implemented in government policy, then regulations are enforced by the environmental agency.
Either a policy change is implemented in government policy or there is no political interference by the government agency.
Regulations are enforced by the environmental agency implies that emissions are reduced in the industrial sector.
An international treaty is signed as a global agreement, or if the climate study research is not completed, then the research data is compromised.
Either economic sanctions are imposed as trade restrictions or an international treaty is not signed as a global agreement.
Should diplomatic relations be strained in international relations, then economic sanctions are not imposed as trade restrictions.
If trade negotiations fail for the trade agreement, then economic sanctions are not imposed as trade restrictions.
Embassy closures of the diplomatic mission occur only if diplomatic relations are strained in international relations.
Either there are embassy closures of the diplomatic mission or the ambassador is recalled from diplomatic staff.
The ambassador being recalled from diplomatic staff leads to trade negotiations failing for the trade agreement.
The weather satellite being operational necessitates that data is collected from the field study.
Either the weather satellite is operational or the monitoring network's ground stations are operational.
The monitoring network's ground stations being operational ensures that data is collected from the field study.
The field team being deployed for the research expedition requires that the data collector equipment is functional.
The data collector equipment being functional implies that if the measurement device's sensors are calibrated, the climate study research is completed.
Either the research paper passed peer review or the news outlet provides positive media coverage.
If it is not the case that the climate study research not being completed leads to the research data being compromised, then publication is delayed by the scientific journal.
Provided that it is not true that the climate study research not being completed implies the research data is compromised, then the findings are challenged in peer review.
The climate study research not being completed causes funding to be approved for the research project.
The climate study research not being completed results in political interference by the government agency.
